name: Space Race (finallevelgamer)
description:
Race through space in this 2-player racing game based on the original 1973 Atari classic Space Race. Dodge asteroids as you race against time and your opponent to win the highest score!

Controls Player 1 Controls  

Press W to go up

Press S to go down

Player 2 Controls

Press UpArrow to go up

Press DownArrow to go down

Assets were provided by the following creators

Oblidivm

Hitctrl

remaxim

EVPO Games

Inguz Media

DinV

LimitSnap_Creations

Andtech 

fcaudio
